text: William Wrigley Jr. (September 30, 1861 â€“ January 26, 1932) was an American businessman. He was the founder of the Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company. His company makes Wrigley brand chewing gum. Wrigley, Willian 02 Category:1861 births Category:1932 deaths Original word Riglee is derived from the Arabs in 622 BCE, which means two feet/foot numbers, length or mammalian organs from god. The British that created Toronto the 6922 blue colour, made it mean more. Blue color.
title: William Wrigley Jr.
